name: Techtic Solutions Inc
description:
Incorporated in 2009, headquartered in the New York City, USA, Techtic Solutions is a leading custom software development company for web & mobile platforms. Our mission is to be guiding force to evolve with best tech-stack & most innovative team to help solve business problems with great digital products & have a great time building them.
Below is the list of services that we offer:
Mobile App Development
Native: Swift, Kotlin & Java
Cross Platform: React Native, Ionic, Flutter

Full Stack Development
Frontend Development: ReactJS, AngularJS, GatsbyJS, & Bootstrap
Backend Development: NodeJS, Laravel, ExpressJS & NestJS
API: JSON, Lumen & GraphQL

eCommerce Store Development (Magento, WooCommerce)
CMS Development (WordPress)
UI/UX Design
Internet of Things
Facts & Figures:
250+ mobile applications deployed in the app store
3000+ websites and web applications are delivered
A list of 500+ satisfied customers across the globe
A professional team of 70+ employees
Agile & lean development methodology
Track record of 95% of clients awarding repeat business
Offices in USA and India
Problem solving through design sprint.
Toolkit: Slack, Jira, Trello, Teamwork, Miro, InVision, Docker, Hasura, AWS, Apollo, Skype, & many more...
Lets Join Hands!
READ MORE...
